title: UNet character detector
description: UNet character detectorThis competition has 2 tasks:  detection classification    Here I do only detection. Classification is made further in the same way as MNIST. For this purpose I need to predict not only centers of characters, but also bounding boxes. UNet is utilized here to predict two binary masks: 1) Bounding boxes 2) Centers
description_lemmatized: unet character detectorthis competition 2 task detection classification detection classification made way mnist purpose need predict center character also bounding box unet utilized predict two binary mask 1 bounding box 2 center
